  "Allegations" : "ALLEGED UNAUTHORIZED TRADING AND UNDISCLOSED VARIABLE ANNUITY REPLACEMENTS.",
  "Settlement Amount" : "$6,724.96",
  "DisplayAAOLinkIfExists" : "N",
  "arbitrationClaimFiledDetail" : "",
  "arbitrationDocketNumber" : "",
  "Broker Comment" : "SAME CLIENT AS OCEANWAVE OCCURRENCE. CLIENT AND REP AGREED ON STRATEGY TO DIVERSIFY CLIENT ANNUITY INVESTMENTS. CLIENT AND REP DISCUSSED THAT A SURRENDER CHARGE WOULD BE INCURRED. CLIENT DISCUSSED THE SURRENDER CHARGE TO BE INCURRED WITH CPA AND HAD STRATEGY. CLIENT AWARE OF SURRENDER CHARGE AND WANTED THE DIVERSIFICATON. WHEN CLIENT COMPLAINED ABOUT THE SURRENDER CHARGE NOTICE, REP/ANNUITY COMPANY OFFERED TO REINSTATE POLICY SO THAT NO CHARGE WAS INCURRED. CLIENT DID NOT ALLOW FOR THE REMEDY. REP BELIEVES THAT ALL TRADES AND INVESTMENTS WERE DISCUSSED IN DETAIL WITH CLIENT AND WITH CLIENT UNDERSTANDING. CLIENT CHANGED THEIR MIND AND ALLEGED THAT REP DID NOT DISCUSS WITH THEM. NO MERIT TO ALLEGATIONS."
}

DISCLOSURE_INFO:
{
  "Allegations" : "TWO BROKERAGE ACCOUNTS WERE ESTABLISHED ON 2/11/2010 IN WHICH ASSETS WERE TRANSFERRED FROM ANOTHER FIRM.  A LETTER FROM THE CUSTOMER'S ATTORNEY WAS RECEIVED ON JUNE 1, 2010 IN WHICH THE ATTORNEY ALLEGES THAT THE REPRESENTATIVE DID NOT MAKE SUITABLE INVESTMENTS FOR THE CUSTOMER, BOTH IN THE SELLING AND PURCHASING OF ASSETS.",
  "DisplayAAOLinkIfExists" : "N",
  "arbitrationClaimFiledDetail" : "",
  "arbitrationDocketNumber" : "",
  "Broker Comment" : "I HAVE REVIEWED THE INFORMATION AND DO UNDERSTAND WHERE THE FIRM IS COMING FROM AS FAR AS THE DETERMINATION THAT THIS IS COMPLAINT DUE TO THE LANGUAGE THAT WAS USED IN THE ATTORNEY LETTERS.  BUT ALSO IN THAT SAME VEIN THE LETTERS ALL ENDED WITH THE FACT THAT THEY NEEDED THE INFORMATION TO CONDUCT A REVIEW OF THE ACCOUNTS AND AFTER MY RESPONSE NOTHING ELSE HAS BEEN DONE OR SENT.  SINCE THEY JUST NEEDED INFORMATION FOR A REVIEW I DO NOT CONSIDER THIS A COMPLAINT, ESPECIALLY BASED ON ALL OF THE INFORMATION THAT WAS CONTAINED IN MY RESPONSE.  I COULD UNDERSTAND IF THIS DETERMINATION WAS MADE AFTER REVIEWING ALL OF THE FACTS ABOUT THIS ESPECIALLY MY RESPONSE.  I BELIEVE THAT AFTER A REVIEW THAT THE DETERMINATION WILL BE MADE THAT THERE IS NO NEED TO PURSUE ANY OTHER ACTION."
}
